name: Bread Craft
description:
Description

A simple simulation game with resource management in which you create and bake bread. To gain flour you can either buy them from the shop or harvest them from your farm. A lot of upgrades are available and unlockable throughout the game to ensure a steady progress.

How To Play Creating A Recipe

The process of creating a recipe is split into 4 Stages. NOTE: things put into the bowl stay in the bowl. There is no taking back. If you want to start over use "Discard".

Stage 1 - Flour Selection

Select what and how much of a given flour to use. Different flours come with different upsides and downsides.

Stage 2 - Dough Ingredient Selection

Select what and how much of a dough ingredient to use. Different ingredients come with different upsides and downsides. Pay close attention to the symbols on the card.

Stage 3 - Topping Selection

Same as above :)

Stage 4 - Bake

All effects and properties of the bread are calculated while baking. Depending on your choices in the prior stages this process might fail.

A bread fails if Quality or Flavor are <= 0,  or if you have more Effects than the dough can support.

If it is successful, you may choose an icon and a name for your bread. If you want to recreate this bread without going through this process, use the "Save Recipe" option.

Farm

When you unlock your farm you can plant and harvest your own wheat insteaed of buying it in the shop. Different kinds of wheat have to be unlocked, except the basic wheat.

Beaware of the storm. Each rainy day has a 1 / 5 chance to become a storm in the night. Causing your plants to take damage (depending on your upgrades) and in turn being destroyed.

Shop

The Shop offers a large variety of flours and ingredients that reset each in-game day. It can be access from any screen using the "$" Button.

Upgrades

In the Upgrades menu you will find everything that can upgraded. At the beginning of the game you will likely only see a few unlocked entries. Most entries are locked behind a previous upgrade and the player level.

Contracts

The Contracts menu shows you your clients. You can access it at any time but new contracts can only be accepted in the morning. A contract can be completed once each day. All contracts are available from the beginning and reset at the beginning of each day and can be completed any number of times again.

Be mindful of which contracts you accept! If you are unable to fulfil the accepted contracts before you go to sleep, you will lose Fame.

Progress

This screen shows the challenges for the player to level up. After completing all entries in the given level, the player will level up and new unlocks become available in the Upgrades menu.
